data.title: Game Of Thrones' Sophie Turner shares AMAZING photos from wedding to Joe Jonas
data.meta_description: Game of Thrones actress Sophie Turner and Jonas Brother Joe Jonas had their...
data.text:
The pair got hitched in France

Game of Thrones actress Sophie Turner and Jonas Brother Joe Jonas had their wedding in France last week, and have now finally shared some pictures from their special day! Sophie, 23, and Joe, 29, officially tied the knot in Las Vegas after the Billboard Awards on 1st May this year, but had a more traditional wedding on Wednesday night.

Now, photos have been shared on Instagram to show off the beautiful event. Sophie, who had her hen do in four different countries, and Joe shared an identical photo of herself and Joe walking down the aisle together after the ceremony - Joe wearing an all-black suit to Sophie's incredible white gown. They simply captioned the photo, 'Mr and Mrs Jonas.'

Many fans and celebrities alike took to comment on the pictures with messages of congratulations. Sophie's GOT co-star Lena Headey wrote, 'Sophie Sophie ... More than I can take so beautiful, what a woman. Happy happy days to you both ðŸ’—ðŸ’—ðŸ’—ðŸ’—ðŸ’—ðŸ’—.' sic

Fellow GOT star Nathalie Emmanuel also added, 'Aww you guys! Congratulations!! You look stunning!'

French fashion designer Nicolas Ghesquiere also shared a photo of Sophie's dress, sharing a backward shot of the incredible gown and veil and the caption, 'Absolut beauty @sophiet'

The wedding took place at ChÃ¢teau du Martinay in Carpentras, before taking their guests to a lavish reception at the ChÃ¢teau de Tourreau in Sarrians, which are around five miles away from each other.

Congratulations to the couple!
